Uses of Class
ui.Component

Packages that use Component 
Package Description
fragment  
ui  

  • Uses of Component in fragment

    Fields in fragment declared as Component 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Component[] Fragment.components
    The collection of components that the fragment is intending to display
    Methods in fragment with parameters of type Component 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private boolean Fragment.checkEventWithinComponent​(Component c, java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
    Checks if the mouse event provided has landed within the component provided

  • Uses of Component in ui

    Subclasses of Component in ui 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Button
    The Button Component allows the user to interact with a visual element via mouse movement and clicks
    class  ColouredComponent
    A coloured version of the Component class, providing storage, setting and getting of the colour used for this component
    class  Label
    The Label class is used to display a single line of text on the game screen
    class  Panel
    The Panel class is used to display a solid, rectangular block of colour; or, the outline of said block.
    Methods in ui that return Component 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Component Component.center​(boolean horizontal, boolean vertical, int xOffset, int yOffset)
    Centers the component either horizontally, vertically, or both.
    Component Component.setHeight​(double b)
    Set the height of the component
    Component Component.setWidth​(double a)
    Set the width of the component
    Component Component.setX​(double a)
    Set the X position of the component
    Component Component.setY​(double b)
    Set the Y position of the component
